name: 王紳
objective: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包含：1.佈局與電路的差異2.CMOS佈局的介紹3.電阻、電容的佈局介紹4.類比電路單元的佈局5.類比電路佈局的規劃6.輸入/輸出焊墊的介紹7.電感的佈局8.射頻電路的佈局9.電流鏡的佈局
schedule:
Week	Topics
1	Introduction
2	CMOS Fabrication Process & Device
3	Transistors & Basic Cells Layout (1)
4	Cadence Tutorial
5	Lab. Homework I – (Digital)
6        Transistors & Basic Cells Layout (2)
7	Resistor & Capacitor
8        Failure Mechanism & /Mismatch
9	Midterm Exam
10	Lab. Homework II – (Analog)
11	Current & Bandgap Reference
12	Mixed signal IC layout
13	Inductor & Transformer
14	Pad Assignment & Measurement
15	Lab. Homework III – (RF)
16	Oral Presentation: Final Report
17       Oral Presentation: Final Report
18	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Assignment： 30%  
Midterm Exam：30%
Final Project：20%
Final Exam：20%
